description: We are seeking a Junior Python (Django) Developer to work collaboratively with team members to develop and contribute to our digital currency network.
responsibilities: Expand your Python skills by working on packages, services, scripts, and deployments in a collaborative work environment
Find, document and track bugs
Create test plans/test cases, write test scripts, and execute all tests
technologyRequirements: Able to manage source code using GitHub
Fast learner who is eager to face new technological challenges and come up with innovative solutions
Curious to learn how things really work
Excellent teamwork and interpersonal communication skills

description: We are looking for a Head of Guerrilla Marketing to help grow our project. The ideal candidate must have a proven success record of developing, implementing, tracking and optimizing digital marketing strategies for our digital currency network. Experience working with actual gorillas not required (but preferred).
responsibilities: Concept, plan, and execute marketing initiatives
Build awareness of our digital currency
Design, build, and maintain our social media presence
Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns

description: We are looking for YouTube Educators with technology, programming, or cryptocurrency related channels to collaborate with thenewboston
responsibilities: Create high quality educational tutorials
Listen to feedback from community on which topics they would like to see most
Optimize titles, descriptions, and tags for optimal SEO
technologyRequirements: YouTube channel related to technology, programming, or cryptocurrency

description: Looking for a Blockchain Cryptocurrency Researcher who has the ability to proactively identify strategic opportunities and research new developments related to cryptocurrency. The candidate should have a deep understanding of computer science, distributed systems, consensus algorithms, networking, and other relevant fields to blockchain technology.
responsibilities: Researching emerging trends and identifying non-obvious opportunities
Working closely with technical teams on their crypto-economic model and other questions that come up around protocols and software
Work on designing and improving our core protocol architecture
technologyRequirements: Solid understanding of cryptography, crypto-economics, and blockchain technologies
Ability to identify unconventional trends and emerging technologies
An open minded research approach and genuine intellectual curiosity

description: As Head of Python Client Library Development you will be responsible for leading the development efforts for our Python client library.
position: Head of Python Client Library Development
responsibilities: Writing technical documentation
Recruiting Python developers
Help assist other developers while managing work between team members
Respond to GitHub issues and review PR's
technologyRequirements: Experience with Python web frameworks, ideally Django

description: We're looking for an experienced UI/UX designer who wants to be a part of designing the future of digital currency. You will work with a team of designers responsible for designing responsive desktop app, mobile app, and the marketing site.
responsibilities: Collaboration with product managers and engineers on user requirements
Help develop the style guide and pattern library
Develop UI mockups or prototypes that clearly illustrate how sites functions and looks
Prepare and present rough drafts to teammates
Identify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)
Conduct layout adjustments based on user feedback

description: Looking for a dedicated Product Manager to help guide the success of our project and help lead the team in doing so. As the project nears release, the team is growing rapidly and we are looking for someone to help manage our goals and strategy.
responsibilities: Defines the product vision, strategy, and roadmap
Works closely with engineering, design, and marketing to ensure user satisfaction goals are met
Gather, manage, and prioritize user requirements
technologyRequirements: Experience in project management tools and software such as Jira and Trello

description: We're looking for an experienced Front-end engineer who is able to lead a team of junior developers. You and your team will be working primarily on the Account Manager and Website repositories to help build the UI's needed for the applications used by our community.
responsibilities: Perform code reviews
Write job descriptions
Interview new candidates
Provide guidance to other developers when assistance is needed
Coach team members on best practices and industry standards
Regular calls with Bucky, Justin, and Kristy to discuss new projects, design improvements, and future roadmap

description: Seeking a Director of Marketing to focus on acquiring new users by creating, executing, and testing marketing strategies.
responsibilities: Work with our different teams (design, social media, SEO, etc...) to plan and discuss marketing goals
Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies
Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests
technologyRequirements: Strong understanding of Blockchain and our project architecture
Background in digital marketing and SEO

description: Seeking a Reddit Moderator to help manage thenewboston subreddit. New users are joining the community quickly now that the network is getting closer to release and we need someone to help answer questions, participate in discussions, and to post frequent updates about the project for the community.
responsibilities: Manage users, posts, flair, rules, the Wiki, and all other aspects of the subreddit
Post relevant content / project updates frequently
Engage with users and related subreddits
Respond to comments and questions from the community
Provide weekly updates to the community regarding answers to common questions as well as any additional relevant information that you feel would be helpful to the community
technologyRequirements: Understanding of Blockchain technology and our project to better assist users with their questions

description: We are looking for an experienced mobile developer to fill our opening of Mobile Lead who is able to lead a team of junior developers. You will be responsible for designing the core architecture, selecting the technologies/programming languages, and choosing team members to help build the mobile application that will be used by our community and after release, the world.
responsibilities: Perform code reviews
Write job descriptions
Interview new candidates
Provide guidance to other developers when assistance is needed
Coach team members on best practices and industry standards
Regular calls with Bucky, Justin, and Kristy to discuss new projects, design improvements, and future roadmap
technologyRequirements: Knowledge of App Store distribution (for both Android and iOS)
